attr.title: Line game
attr.desc:
An on-rails bullet hell.
Weave past bullets and fill containers through 3 worlds.
attr.inst:
Install port zip.
Download LineGameWINDOWS.zip file from the Itch.
Extract zip into the ports/linegame/assets folder.
attr.inst_md:
Install port zip.
Download LineGameWINDOWS.zip file from the [Itch](https://sirmilkman.itch.io/lines).
Extract zip into the `ports/linegame/assets` folder.
